alert.note: Alert for Jewell (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 14 at 5:01PM CDT until April 14 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jewell County in north central Kansas... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 501 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mankato, or 20 miles north of Beloit, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mankato around 510 PM CDT. Montrose around 515 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lovewell State Park and Webber. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
